sentences.english: I wanted to tell everybody about the murderer and organize a search party. Then I thought about the story I would have to tell the police.

sentences.english: Police believe the perpetrators who should be left scratch marks on her tower.
sentences.chinese: 警方相信凶手身上应留有姬塔抓伤的痕迹。

sentences.english: The police are always hounding me.

sentences.english: The murderer entreated the judge for mercy, but was sentenced to the gallows .

sentences.english: It was spine-chilling to learn that a murderer was in our neighborhood.
sentences.chinese: 获悉杀人凶手就在我们附近，让人不寒而栗。

sentences.english: Our unsub islearning. He's improved his technique.
sentences.chinese: 凶手一直在学习呢，他的技术提高不少啊。

sentences.english: Nobody expected a respectable 65 year-old man to be a killer.
sentences.chinese: 谁能料到一个可敬的65岁老人会是杀人凶手。

sentences.english: And we will not be intimidated by thugs and killers.
sentences.chinese: 暴徒和凶手吓不倒我们。

sentences.english: At the of the play Hamlet avenged his fathers death on the murderer.

sentences.english: They acted in conjunction with the police in the hunt for the murderer.

sentences.english: Renee Terrell says her boyfriend Christopher Luttrell is the killer.
